notesStmt.note: Bifolium contains a fragment from the end of the Maggid segment, including the end of the first Hallel (the fragment starts Psalms CXIII 7 מעפר דל) to the blessing at the end of this section, up to דמים על קיר; Before the blessing is an instruction in Judeo-Arabic תם יקול.
Condition: consecutive, complete; top and bottom lines, and beginning of Psalm CXIV, in enlarged, hollow characters filled in with red ink.
